channel.title: Personalization on Aakarsh Yadav
channel.description: Recent content in Personalization on Aakarsh Yadav

item.title: Product recommendation system
item.description: Using a russian online marketplace company Avito’s dataset containing features like: UserID ProductID AdID UserDemoraphics AdPosition Click …. and many more. The main aim was to produce personalized product recommendation based on the user interaction with products and similarity with other users. I have tried to prevent any monotonus recommendations by keep the accuracy low to include different products. LightFM model was used to include both user and Ad meta deta to determine the same.
